EdgeCaseAnnotations.ZeroValueBids: If a zero or low-value bid is submitted, it does not affect the contract due to the require(msg.value > currentBid) check.

EdgeCaseAnnotations.FrontrunnerRevertsRefund: If the frontrunnerâ€™s address has a fallback function that reverts or causes the send operation to fail, the contract may be unable to continue processing bids, resulting in a Denial of Service.

CommonAttackPatterns.DenialOfService: A frontrunner can implement a fallback function that reverts on receiving Ether, preventing any other users from outbidding them.

RecoveryMechanisms: No explicit recovery mechanisms exist in this contract to handle Denial of Service scenarios.
